room.name: The Path To The Dwarven Village
room.description: You are walking down a path that leads to the dwarven village. Above you, you can see the Turning Point, and to the north the path continues toward the mountains.

direction.general_description: You can see the city of Midgaard.

room.name: The Path At The Base Of The Mountain
room.description: Now you are at the bottom of a rugged mountain. The forest around you is very dense, and it seems very dark to the north.

direction.general_description: The path coninues up the mountain.
The path heads toward the main city of Midgaard.

room.name: The Path At The Middle Of The Mountain
room.description: Standing on the middle of the mountain, you can easily see the city to the south, and the top of the mountain is very near to the north.

direction.general_description: The top of the mountain is easily seen from here.
The base of the mountain is near.

room.name: The Top Of The Mountain
room.description: You are now on the top of the mountain. To the south you see a path leading down the mountain. To the east and west you see entrances to what seems like mines.

direction.general_description: An entrance to the mountain which seems to lead underground.
The path leads down the mountain to the main city of Midgaard.
There is an entrance to the mountain.

room.name: The Narrow Path
room.description: This is a narrow path leading to the Dwarven Kingdom. It looks less travelled than the others, and it is very creepy. The path opens up to the south, and continues to the north.

room.name: The Entrance To The Mountain
room.description: Here is an entrance to the mountain. The door looks very well built, and you can hear noise coming from within.

room.name: A Bend In The Narrow Path
room.description: This is a narrow path that bends to the east here. The trees hang over the path, and it is very overgrown. The narrow path continues to the south and to the east.

extra_description.description: They hang over the road in the most ominous of ways.

room.name: The Narrow Path
room.description: This path is very narrow, and it continues to the north and west.

room.name: The Narrow North-South Path
room.description: This path leads to the north and south. To the north you can see a door, and to the south the path continues.

room.name: The Door To The Kingdom
room.description: Here the path turns to the west. You can see a door in front of you, and the path continues to the west and south.

room.name: On The Path To The Castle
room.description: You are on a path that will eventually lead to the castle. It continues north to the castle, and there is a door in the southern wall.

room.name: Still On The Path To The Castle
room.description: You are still on the path to the castle, or back to the Dwarven village, whichever way you wish to go. The path continues to the north and south.

room.name: The Door To The Castle
room.description:
Here there is a door to the castle to the east. The castle is elegantly designed, and looks much like a roll of toilet paper standing on its end. There is a sign which says:
****************************************** * WELCOME TO THE CASTLE OF STRANGELOVE * * Here, celibacy is uninvited * ******************************************

room.name: Inside The Entrance
room.description: Everything here is covered in soot and very grimy. The path continues to the east and north, and there is a door to the west.

direction.general_description: The little underground path continues to the north.
The path leads outside the entrance.
This looks like an entrance to some type of store room.

room.name: The Path
room.description: You are on a path in the dwarven village which leads north to the shops and south to the corner of the area.

room.name: A Turn In The Road
room.description: You are on a path that leads to the Hide & Tooth shop to the west, and the path continues to the south.

direction.general_description: The Hide & Tooth shop can be seen to the west.

room.name: The Hide & Tooth Shop
room.description: You are in the Hide & Tooth shop. Here you may buy the finest in Dwarven weapons and armors. The path continues to the north and east.

room.name: The Path To The North Of The Shop
room.description: You are on a path to the north of the Hide & Tooth shop. The path continues to the north, and there is Granite Head's bakery to the west.

room.name: North Of The Shops
room.description: Here the path bends to the east towards the barracks. To the south you can see the shops.

room.name: A Path By The Hospital
room.description: Here the path passes by the Hospital to the north. It continues to the east to the barracks, and to the west.

room.name: A Path Next To The Barracks
room.description: Here the path continues west, and east to the barracks.

room.name: The Entrance To The Barracks
room.description: Here there is an entrance to the barracks to the south, and the path continues to the west.

room.name: A Guard House
room.description: You are in the guard house to the west of the entrance to the castle. There are nudie posters covering the walls.

extra_description.description: There is a wall poster of a nude Minne Pearl.

room.name: The First Barrack Room
room.description: Here is the first of two main rooms of barracks. The barracks continue to the south, and you can leave the room to the north.

room.name: The Back Of The Barracks
room.description: Here is the back of the dwarven barracks. There are rows of beds here, and there is a stench that is unbearable.

room.name: Inside Of Castle Strangelove
room.description: You are just inside the castle. It is very tubular in shape, and it is very featureless. There is a set of stairs that lead up, and the door leads out of the castle to the west.

room.name: A Store Room
room.description: There is a layer of dust on the floor at least 3 inches thick! It is probable that not many people have been in here for many months.

direction.general_description: A lighted area that looks like a well worn path.
After blowing all the dust off the floor, you notice a trapdoor!

extra_description.description: After blowing all the dust off the floor, you notice a trapdoor!

room.name: The Wine Cellar
room.description: This room smells like wine, and you can only assume it used to be a wine cellar at one time.

room.name: On The Stairs In Castle Strangelove
room.description: The stairs continue to circle up and down here.

room.name: On The Stairs
room.description: You are still circling around on the stairs. You are starting to get dizzy from going around and around and around and around and around. The stairs continue up and down.

room.name: At The Top Of The Stairs
room.description: You are at the top of the stairs in the castle. There is an exit to the east, and the stairs lead down.

room.name: The Queen's Waiting Room
room.description: This is the Queen's waiting room. Here the men literally 'wait' for the queen. You've heard that the queen really likes to get to 'know' her people, in the biblical sense. The Queen's bedroom is to the north, and you can see stairs to the west.

room.name: The Queen's Bedroom
room.description:
This is the Queen's bedroom. The bed is all ruffled, and there is a stack of dirty sheets piled in the corner. There is a ladder that leads down, out of the castle, and you can leave the room to the south. There is also a small wooden door to the west. There is a sign that says:
------------------------- | I'm busy right now, | | and don't know when | | Ill be back, but if | | there is a key here | | take it and PLEASE, | | try to get my birth | | control pills back! | | I've heard they can | | be found somewhere, | | deep in the mines.. | -------------------------

room.name: The North Side Of Castle Strangelove
room.description: You are standing on the north side of Castle Strangelove. You notice that you are no longer inside the mountain anymore either. Along the southern horizon you see towering mountains. The only exit, however, is back up the ladder into the Queen's Bedroom.

room.name: The Hospital
room.description: You are inside the Dwarven Hospital. It smells like rubbing alcohol, and there is blood all over the walls.

room.name: Granite Head's Bakery
room.description: The aroma coming from this room is astonishing. You can almost taste the pastries dissolving in your mouth.

room.name: The Dark Path
room.description: This path is very well worn, and there is an entrance to the mines to the east, while the path continues to the north and west.

room.name: The Mine Entrance
room.description: The little path here leads down toward the mines, while the worn path continues to the west.

room.name: At The Bottom Of The Mineshaft
room.description: You are at the bottom of the mineshaft. The air here is very sooty, and it is very hard to breath. The mineshaft leads up and east.

room.name: On The Path Inside The Mine
room.description: You are deep inside the mine, and you feel very uncomfortable. The path continues to the east, and leads to the mineshaft to the west.

room.name: The Mine Crossroad
room.description: You are at a crossroad in the mine. There is a door to the north, and the path continues to the south, east, and west.

room.name: The Coal Room
room.description: You are inside the storage area for the raw materials that are found down here. The room is very unsturdy as the supports are very rickety.

room.name: The Mine Maze
room.description: You have entered the maze of the mines. To the east you can see some inscriptions, and you can exit to the south.

room.name: At The Maze Inscription
room.description:
You are inside the maze, but not far enough in that you could get lost. There is an enscription on the wall which says:
1 3 2 4 N W N S
This isn't too tough, so don't take it so rough.

room.name: The Maze
room.description: You are in a maze.

room.name: The Maze
room.description: You are in a maze.

room.name: The Maze
room.description: You are in a maze.

room.name: The Mining Equipment Room
room.description: This is the storage room for equipment used by the Dwarven miners. It is very small, and you can tell that not many miners actually use equipment.

room.name: The End Of The Maze
room.description:
You have solved the maze. You can tell by the last few moves that there is no way that a dumb worker could have figured that out. It seems pretty desolate here. To the south is a bleak room. To the north, you see the maze. There is a sign above the south exit:
THOSE WHO ENTER, PLAN ON A TIMELY DEATH. (ESPECIALLY IF YOU'RE LOYAL TO THE QUEEN)

room.name: The Mazekeeper's Room
room.description: You have entered the Mazekeeper's room. There are pictures of the Queen with darts thrown at it. Spraypainted on the wall are things like 'the queen shall suffer' and 'Catholics Rule'.

room.name: The Treasury
room.description: This room appears to be the Queen's Treasury. There is one exit, back to the east.
